methods.getStepValue:
Get the current value of the the current step/subrange.

:return: (int) the % complete of the current step - a number between 1 and 100
methods.getValue:
get the current value of the progress object.

:return: (int) the % complete of the topmost ProcessStatus - a number between 1 and 100
methods.update:
Update the progress % and status message.

:param progress: (int) - percent complete (0-100)
:param status: (java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String>) - optional message supplier

text:
Minimal root implementation of a Process Status.
 No interface is needed at this point.
